Question
========

A first vase contains two white and three black balls, a second vase contains three white and one black. If you randomly choose one of the two vases and you draw one ball from it, what is the probability that this ball is white?

Answerlist
----------

* 3/4
* 3/5
* 5/9
* 3/10
* 23/40

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3/4: Incorrect
* 3/5: Incorrect
* 5/9: Incorrect
* 3/10: Incorrect
* 23/40: Correct
